Package edu.umb.cs682.ecom.backend.models

Class Product

  • Object
    • Product
  • public class Product
extends Object
    Product represents a commercial product to be sold in the online marketplace.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Product()
      Default constructor for an Product object.
      Product​(String name, String shortDescription, String longDescription, float price, int quantity, Set<String> categories, String image)
      Constructs a new Product object with the given details.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Product

        public Product()
        Default constructor for an Product object. Only used by Spring for field injection

      • Product

        public Product​(String name,
               String shortDescription,
               String longDescription,
               float price,
               int quantity,
               Set<String> categories,
               String image)
        Constructs a new Product object with the given details.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of this Product
        shortDescription - a short description of this Product
        longDescription - a longer description of this Product
        price - the price of this Product
        quantity - the initially available quantity of this Product
        categories - the set of Categories to which this Product will initially belong
        image - URL to an image of this Product

    • Method Detail

      • updateProduct

        public void updateProduct​(Product otherProduct)
        Updates this Product using the details of the given Product.

        The otherProduct argument to this method is typically a Product object that is automatically generated from a frontend request, which lacks a Product ID as it has not been saved to the database.

        Parameters:
        otherProduct - the Product from which new values are received

      • removeCategory

        public void removeCategory​(String categoryID)
        Removes the Category by the given categoryID from this product's list of Categories.
        Parameters:
        categoryID - the ID of the category to be removed
